AR App
Development

Increase your business revenue using proper data allocation
We develop AR apps for your business needs to focus on a constant consequence for the customer or user engagement.

Let’s Converse

Augmented reality is getting into a peak for the business who pretend to increase their customer attention. It helps your customer to get a flow with your product and services that help your revenue to get an increase.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column el_class=”page-benefits-of-using”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Benefits of Using an AR Application

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=”” css=”.vc_custom_1594490004858{margin-top: 70px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Increase Engagement and Interaction” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:28px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]AR apps are used to increase the attention of the work in terms of data. Approaching such technology will increase the trust of your app and the company.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Develop Brands” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:28px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]By integrating AR services for your customers will tend to create huge traffic and lead to developing a brand. Developing a brand will increase the status of your products and services.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Eliminates Specific Media to Advertise” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:28px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInUp”]Approaching AR technology will term to omit the additional media support to create attention for your product and services list.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeInUp” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”]

Services Provided

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” enable_grid_lines=”” el_class=”benefits-using-icon”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1592071033358{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
Apps for Android and iOS

The Devine Globe helps your customers by developing an AR app for both the users of Android and iOS. With our specialized developers, the proper analysis will be lead and developed.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1592071045810{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
AR integration to E-commerce

The integration of AR in E-commerce will improve business income. Hence do not wait to increase your business revenue.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1592071061363{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
AR Game App Development

The gaming industry is changing a lot. Involving into the AR part helps your gaming customers to get retain and increase the interest.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” enable_grid_lines=”” el_class=”benefits-using-icon”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1592071068092{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
AR Support and Maintenance

AR is a huge industry and maintaining such a huge industry requires a huge source of the response. The Devine Globe team enable your requirement in term of developing AR app.

Seamless support for the features of the AR app.

Proper quality checking will be applied to generate unbroken satisfaction from the app.

Dedicate developers will help your product to improve in terms of business and features.
